issue.title: [Python] Make dataset Expression objects serializable
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8060](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8060). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be good to be able to pickle pyarrow.dataset.Expression objects (eg for use in dask.distributed)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8060?focusedCommentId=17056221) by Ben Kietzman (bkietz):*
this should probably wait for ARROW-7878 (and follow-ups) which includes the replacement for this class

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8060?focusedCommentId=17063490) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
`[~fsaintjacques]` I think we determined that this should not be blocked by LogicalPlan, right?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8060?focusedCommentId=17066940) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6702
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6702>
